alert.note: Alert for Cape Decision to Salisbury Sound Coastal Area; Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 23 at 6:47AM AKST until December 23 at 4:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow expected. New snow accumulations of around 2 inches. * WHERE...Baranof Island, including Port Alexander. Western Prince of Wales Island, including Edna Bay. * WHEN...Until 4 PM AKST Thursday, with most falling during the morning hours. * IMPACTS...Reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dry, fluffy snow may accumulate quickly with snowfall rates as high as an inch per hour. Snow took longer to begin in Sitka and Klawock, therefore lower amounts are expected there.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Cape Decision to Salisbury Sound Coastal Area; Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area
